stateCompliance.headline: Understanding Cash Advance Laws in Fort Lauderdale, Florida
stateCompliance.content: Residents of Fort Lauderdale are protected by Florida's comprehensive payday lending regulations, administered by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation's Division of Consumer Finance. Fort Lauderdale residents benefit from strong protections against predatory lending practices and unlimited rollovers.
keyPoints: All payday lenders in Fort Lauderdale must be licensed by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation
You can only have one payday loan at a time in Florida, enforced by statewide database
Single-payment loans are capped at $500 with maximum 10% fee plus $5 verification fee
Installment loans are capped at $1,000 with maximum 8% biweekly fee on outstanding balance
You must wait 24 hours after paying off one loan before taking out another
Loan rollovers and extensions are prohibited by law
If you can't pay on time, you're entitled to a 60-day grace period with free credit counseling
You cannot be criminally prosecuted for an unpaid payday loan
Prepayment penalties are prohibited - you can pay off early without extra cost
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is provided for general educational purposes only and should not be construed as legal or financial advice. Payday loan laws and regulations are subject to change. For the most accurate and up-to-date information about Florida payday loan regulations, please contact the Florida Office of Financial Regulation at (850) 487-9687 or visit flofr.gov. Consult with a licensed financial advisor or attorney regarding your specific situation before making borrowing decisions.

faq.question: Where is your Fort Lauderdale cash advance location?
faq.answer: Our Fort Lauderdale branch is located at 516 Las Olas Boulevard, Suite 250, right in the heart of the famous Las Olas shopping and dining district. We're just blocks from the beach and easily accessible from I-95 Exit 29.

faq.question: What are your hours at the Fort Lauderdale location?
faq.answer: We're open Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, and Saturday 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM. We're closed on Sundays. No appointment needed!

faq.question: Is it safe to get cash on Las Olas Boulevard?
faq.answer: Yes! Las Olas is a busy, secure commercial area with lots of traffic and foot traffic. We have secure facilities and safe cash handling procedures.

faq.question: Can tourists visiting Fort Lauderdale get a cash advance?
faq.answer: Yes! We welcome visitors and tourists. You'll need a valid passport or government-issued ID and proof of income. Many visitors use our services for emergency cash while staying in the area.

faq.question: What if I need a larger amount than $500?
faq.answer: We offer installment loans up to $1,000 that allow you to pay over 60-90 days instead of in one lump sum. This gives you more flexibility if you need a larger amount.
